Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or 

An open letter to President Sands

Search salaries of employees from Virginia Tech and other universities dating back to  PERIOD

Georgia was just better PERIOD

No PERIOD  Virginia Tech softball ended their season in the form of a blowout loss against No PERIOD  Georgia  on Sunday PERIOD And across their two matchups in the previous two days the Bulldogs  outscored the Hokies   PERIOD

The Bulldogs pitched better hit better and played better defense PERIOD Shelby Walters pitched a complete game for the Bulldogs PERIOD She gave up three runs and five hits striking out five batters and walking none PERIOD

In a rare bright spot for the Hokies they notched their one hundredth home run of the season hitting one on Sunday PERIOD Entering Sunday they were tied with Oklahoma for most team home runs in the country PERIOD

Sundays game went rotten for the Hokies from the beginning when Georgia scored five runs before Tech even touched a bat PERIOD Lyndsey Grein pitched twothirds of that inning allowing five runs and five hits PERIOD

In the top of the first Bulldogs third baseman Sara Mosley doubled to leftcenter field scoring center fielder Dallis Goodnight PERIOD Then second baseman Sydney Kuma hit a single to score Mosley PERIOD Georgia added to the damage when designated player Sydney Chambley hit a tworun homer and left fielder Jaydyn Goodwin hit another home run PERIOD

Emma Lemley relieved Grein before she could record three outs and didnt fare much better PERIOD She pitched . innings allowing seven runs and six hits striking out six batters and walking two PERIOD

Georgia built their lead with two runs in the third inning and another in the fourth before Tech crossed the plate PERIOD Chambley hit another homer in the third and catcher Lyndi Rae Davis hit one in the fourth PERIOD By the time the Hokies reached the scoreboard they trailed  PERIOD

In the bottom of the fourth designated player Emma Ritter hit into a fielders choice to score left fielder Kelsey Brown PERIOD Later in the frame first baseman Jayme Bailey singled to left field scoring Ritter PERIOD

To solidify the rout the Bulldogs tacked on four more runs in the sixth inning PERIOD Davis hit into a fielders choice scoring shortstop Ellie Armistead PERIOD Then right fielder Jayda Kearney singled scoring Goodnight PERIOD Later Mosley singled to left field which scored pinch runner Hayley Eaton PERIOD To conclude their rally Chambley hit a single allowing Kearney to score PERIOD

Although Tech scored one more run later that inning their season ended via a runrule loss PERIOD The Bulldogs overmatched their opponents in two consecutive games ending any hopes of a Hokies Womens College World Series run PERIOD

Georgia will advance to the Tallahassee Superregional and play No PERIOD  Florida State PERIOD As for the Hokies they will retreat to Blacksburg and regroup for the  season PERIOD
